channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Standoff with troops in Los Angeles reignites old feud as Newsom resists Trump’s immigration raids
item.description: An escalating clash pits a Republican president looking to fulfill his mass deportation goals against a Democratic governor with White House aspirations hoping to mobilize opposition.

item.title: Dozens of LA-area mayors demand the Trump administration stop intensified immigration raids
What to know about the protests over Trump’s immigration crackdown in LA and other cities
